topics.title: Pattern AI Agent Introduction and Architecture
topics.summary: Mehrdad introduces Pattern, an AI-powered agent designed to connect to multiple data sources for real-time blockchain insights. The system is built as a modular, extensible AI agent with connectors to various live data streams including public APIs and on-chain data providers.

topics.title: Pattern Blockchain Integration and Ergo Support
topics.summary: Pattern's blockchain integration capabilities are explained, including support for fetching smart contract source code, invoking contract functions, and performing on-chain analytics. The announcement that Pattern now includes Ergo ecosystem support for ErgoHack 10 is made, enabling queries about Ergo smart contracts, transactions, and token data.

topics.title: Pattern Demo: ErgoTree Script Analysis
topics.summary: Live demonstration of Pattern's capabilities using the demo site at mvp.pattern.global. Mehrdad shows how to query for contract information by asking about a specific box address, retrieving its ErgoTree script, and getting an explanation of what the script does.

topics.title: Pattern Demo: Wallet Transaction Analysis
topics.summary: Second demonstration showing Pattern's ability to analyze wallet transactions by querying the last transaction of a specific wallet address and calculating ERG transfers. The demo concludes with an invitation for community feedback and suggestions on the tool's functionality.
